text: I want you to tell me anything that you see going on in that picture. What do you see? . They see the cookie jar with . the girl helping him. . But that isn't wrong. Their mother was there, spilling the water. long silence This wouldn't be the grandmother, I guess. It's the children. long silence Okay, what is she going on over here? Oh well, I think it's going to fall pretty quick. But, um, she was helping. . He handed the cookies to his sister, I guess. .. Anything else? . Well, it uh... .. Mother was drying her dishes. . He's gonna get the water out of there. long silence Anything else? Now he might fall soon if he doesn't. . He's scared for life. . Is that it? I think so.
